titleStmt.title: An Account of the proceedings at the Guild-Hall of the city of London on Saturday, September 12 [i.e. 13], 1679 with the substance of Sir Thomas Player's speech, and the Lord Mayor's answer thereunto.
titleStmt.author: Clayton, Robert, Sir, 1629-1707.
Player, Thomas, Sir, d. 1686.
City of London (England). Lord Mayor.

notesStmt.note: An attack on the Popish plot.
Reproduction of original in Yale University Library.
